column4: Hi, I just formatted my flash drive to ext3 and I can't write files to it, whats up?
I just formatted my flash drive to ext3 and I can't write files to it
I just formatted my flash drive to ext3 and I can't write files to it, how do I enable it to do so
read write, as opposed to ro (read only)
type mount and see how the options are
if they're wrong, you can set up an fstab entry with the proper values
how to set it up to read/write
You can try something like mount -o remount,rw /dev/your_drive
